show.title: பிரியாத வரம் வேண்டும்
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/qaBcS4
show.description: When a former army officer pretends to be mentally ill to cope with his family's dark secrets, an unlikely romance with his caretaker forces him to choose between love and the facade he's maintained for years.
show.description_secondary: When a former army officer pretends to be mentally ill to cope with his family's dark secrets, an unlikely romance with his caretaker forces him to choose between love and the facade he's maintained for years.
